string.InviteDescription: Share this link to invite other users
string.WorkspaceNameRule: Workspace name cannot contain special characters except -
string.WorkspaceNameRuleCapital: The workspace name must contain only lowercase letters
string.WorkspaceNameRuleHyphen: The workspace name cannot start with a dash (-)
string.WorkspaceNameRuleHyphenEnd: The workspace name cannot end with a dash (-)
string.WorkspaceNameRuleLengthLow: Workspace name must be at least 3 characters
string.WorkspaceNameRuleLengthHigh: Workspace name must be no longer than 63 characters
string.RecoveryLinkSent: Password recovery link sent to email
string.ConfirmationSent: A message has been sent to your email containing a link to confirm the your address.
string.ConfirmationSent2: Please follow the link to complete your sign up.
